title: Player Super Justice
alternative_title: Wanjia Chao Zhengyi ; 玩家超正义
status: Wanjia Chao Zhengyi ; 玩家超正义
description:
Description :
        Annan, a senior game producer, traveled to the foggy continent of another world and became a rare elite NPC with a player system. But he still has a heart that belongs to a player. Although I love to stir up trouble and act recklessly, I am a good player and a righteous partner favored by this world. Now I am carrying the main quest, as a righteous player, I am ordered by heaven to eliminate you, the evil NPC!
